analyzed: āśramavāsikam parva
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_15.1 //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet
eka chatrām mahīm rājñi praśāsati yudhiṣṭhire

original: nāśrūyatārtijaḥ śabdo na cādṛśyata yācakaḥ // Bhmj_15.2 //
analyzed: na aśrūyata ārti jaḥ śabdaḥ na ca adṛśyata yācakaḥ
yaśasā dharma vīrasya tasya vyāpte jagattraye
rāghava ādi kathā bandheṣu abhūt manda acaraḥ janaḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ sa viduraḥ gāndhārī ca pativratā

original: satataṃ daivataṃ tasya babhūvuḥ pratimāṃ vinā // Bhmj_15.4 //
analyzed: satatam daivatam tasya babhūvuḥ pratimām vinā
bhojane dhṛtarāṣṭrasya sa sūdān svayam aikṣata
tad śāsanāt na apriyāṇi kuruvṛddhasya pāṇḍavāḥ

original: aślīlaṃ dadataḥ sarve prativādaṃ pracakrire // Bhmj_15.6 //
analyzed: aślīlam dadataḥ sarve prativādam pracakrire
rāja arham bhojanam bhuṅkte sarvam eva ambikāsutaḥ

original: iti viśrāvya gūḍhaṃ tu so 'bhavatphalabhojanaḥ // Bhmj_15.7 //
analyzed: iti viśrāvya gūḍham tu saḥ abhavat phala bhojanaḥ
aho vratavataḥ tasya jāpinaḥ kṣiti śāyinaḥ

original: jāyāsakhasya vairāgyaṃ bubudhe na yudhiṣṭhiraḥ // Bhmj_15.8 //
analyzed: jāyā sakhasya vairāgyam bubudhe na yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
evam nivasatām teṣām mithas praṇaya śālinām

original: kāle pravāhini yayuḥ samaḥ pañcādhikā daśa // Bhmj_15.9 //
analyzed: kāle pravāhini yayuḥ samaḥ pañca adhikāḥ daśa
kadācid atha saṃsmṛtya bhīmaḥ kaurava durnayān

original: cakāra tadvadhakathāṃ bahuśabdaṃ ca durmadaḥ // Bhmj_15.10 //
analyzed: cakāra tad vadha kathām bahu śabdam ca durmadaḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ jita krodhaḥ tat ākarṇya vadhū sakhaḥ
vidhāya aśruta vat sarvam abhūt saṃnyāsa lālasaḥ
tatas tasya ati nirvedāt bhāva bhrama parāṅbhukham
babhuva śama kāmasya vairāgya ābharaṇam manaḥ
viyoga śata dagdhānām avamāna viṣa āśinām
sarva tyāgaḥ sukhāya eva nirvāṇa amṛta nirjharaḥ
sa yudhiṣṭhiram abhyetya vana vāsa samutsukaḥ
uvāca niyama kṣāmaḥ dama upaśama manthanam
varṇa āśrama guroḥ rājan anujānīhi pārtha mām

original: daśāṃ vṛddhocitāṃ labdhuṃ vrajāmyeṣa tapovanam // Bhmj_15.15 //
analyzed: daśām vṛddha ucitām labdhum vrajāmi eṣa tapaḥ vanam
iyam bhava sukha āsvāda ratiḥ tad para cetasām
nṛṇām ajīrṇa tṛṣṇā iva satatam parivardhate
spṛśa mām puṇya gandhena vapuṣā dharmanandana

original: svasti te pāhi pṛthivīṃ putravatpaśya ca prajāḥ // Bhmj_15.17 //
analyzed: svasti te pāhi pṛthivīm putra vat paśya ca prajāḥ
kośa durga bala ādāne kurvīthāḥ yatnam uttamam

original: gūḍhamantraḥ prajāpāla unmūlā hi nṛpaśriyaḥ // Bhmj_15.18 //
analyzed: gūḍha mantraḥ prajāpālaḥ unmūlāḥ hi nṛpa śriyaḥ
iti uktvā mūrdhni upāghrāya nirāhāraḥ kṛśaḥ nṛpam
kampamāna tanuḥ vṛddhaḥ babhūva gamana utsukaḥ
tam sa aśru locanaḥ rājā yayāce racita añjaliḥ

original: māmutsṛjya kathaṃ nāma gantumarhasi kānanam // Bhmj_15.20 //
analyzed: mām utsṛjya katham nāma gantum arhasi kānanam
tvad pāda sevā saṃtoṣam tyuktum na aham iha utsahe

original: vītarāgasya te tāta gṛheṣveva tapovanam // Bhmj_15.21 //
analyzed: vīta rāgasya te tāta gṛheṣu eva tapaḥ vanam

original: iti tenārthyamāno 'pi bubudhe na yadā sa tat /
analyzed: iti tena arthyamānaḥ api bubudhe na yadā sa tat
tadā satyavatī sūnuḥ muniḥ svayam upāyayau
sa dharmarājam abhyetya babhāṣe jñāna locanaḥ

original: tyajyatāmeṣa bhūpāla vṛddho yātu tapovanam // Bhmj_15.23 //
analyzed: tyajyatām eṣa bhūpāla vṛddhaḥ yātu tapaḥ vanam
śrutasya vayasaḥ buddheḥ vivekasya kulasya ca

original: supakvamanasāṃ kāle vairāgyaṃ paramaṃ phalam // Bhmj_15.24 //
analyzed: su pakva manasām kāle vairāgyam paramam phalam
jarā śubhreṣu keśeṣu praśānte viṣaya ādare

original: tapovanātparaṃ manye bhūṣaṇaṃ na śarīriṇām // Bhmj_15.25 //
analyzed: tapaḥ vanāt param manye bhūṣaṇam na śarīriṇām
iti uktvā antarhite vyāse viṣaṇṇena mahībhujā
kṛcchrāt iva tathā iti uktaḥ jaharṣa kuru puṃgavaḥ
sa kṛtvā bhīṣma mukhyānām gurūṇām śrāddham uttamam

original: mahārhaḥ vipulaṃ dānaṃ dadau brāhmaṇasaṃmatam // Bhmj_15.27 //
analyzed: mahārhaḥ vipulam dānam dadau brāhmaṇa saṃmatam
dadataḥ tasya no vighnam cakrire pāṇḍu nandanāḥ
bhamaḥ tu kopa tāmra akṣaḥ dhanaṃjayam abhāṣata

original: kilbiṣaṃ yaiḥ kṛtaṃ ghoraṃ purāsmāsu bahucchalam /
analyzed: kilbiṣam yaiḥ kṛtam ghoram purā asmāsu bahu chalam

original: kauravāṇāṃ kathaṃ śrāddhe teṣāṃ vittavyayaṃ sahe // Bhmj_15.29 //
analyzed: kauravāṇām katham śrāddhe teṣām vitta vyayam sahe
yātu duryodhanaḥ pāpaḥ narakam sahitaḥ anujaiḥ

original: vayaṃ śrāddhaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ svayaṃ śaṃtanunandane // Bhmj_15.30 //
analyzed: vayam śrāddham kariṣyāmaḥ svayam śaṃtanu nandane
iti bruvāṇam asakṛt nivārya pavanātmajam
na etat vācyam punar iti provāca śvetavāhanaḥ
atha pratasthe gāndhāryā saha rājā ambikāsutaḥ
gāvalgani sakhaḥ paurān āmantrya vidura anugaḥ
putraiḥ udaśru nayanaiḥ snuṣābhiḥ ca arthitā bhṛśam
kuntī tapaḥ vana rucim na atyajat devara anugā
atha agre sahitaḥ kuntyā dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saha anujaḥ
rājarṣi juṣṭam vipinam viveśa viśada āśayaḥ
tatra rājarṣi varyeṇa śatayūpena saṃgataḥ
jaṭā valkala bhṛt cakre sa anujaḥ su ciram tapaḥ
tam tīvra niyama kṣāmam nārada ādyāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ
kṛtakṛtya tayā prāptam draṣṭavyāḥ draṣṭum āyayuḥ
sarvābhiḥ bharata strībhiḥ sahitāḥ te mahā rathāḥ
nidhāya kānana upānte caturaṅge mahat balam
apanīta sita chattra cāmarāḥ pāda cāriṇaḥ
tapaḥ vanam praviviśuḥ dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa sevitam
te praṇamya ambikā sūnum jananīm saṃjayam tathā
viṣaṇṇāḥ prayayuḥ mūrcchām snāyu śeṣān vilokya tān
dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ api rājānam saṃjayena niveditam

original: papraccha kuśalaṃ kośe paure janapade tathā // Bhmj_15.40 //
analyzed: papraccha kuśalam kośe paure janapade tathā
tapaḥ vṛddhim tatas pṛṣṭvā kuruvṛddham yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: viduraḥ kveti papraccha sa ca pṛṣṭastamabravīt // Bhmj_15.41 //
analyzed: viduraḥ kva iti papraccha sa ca pṛṣṭaḥ tam abravīt

original: viduro 'sminvane putra dṛśyate na ca dṛśyate // Bhmj_15.42 //
analyzed: viduraḥ asmin vane putra dṛśyate na ca dṛśyate
iti ukte dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa samabhyāyāt yadṛcchayā
viduraḥ dhūli digdha aṅgaḥ bilva mātra mukhaḥ kṛśaḥ
āśrame sa janam dṛṣṭvā palāyana paraḥ abhavat
tam anvadhāvat ekākī sa aśru netraḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
dṛśyaḥ kvacid adṛśyaḥ ca viduraḥ tam anādarāt

original: apaśyadvītarāgāṇāṃ tṛṇe rājñi ca tulyatā // Bhmj_15.45 //
analyzed: apaśyat vīta rāgāṇām tṛṇe rājñi ca tulya tā
sa vṛkṣa mūlam āśritya jñāna dehaḥ jvalan iva
uktaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ asmi iti rājñā saṃbhāṣaṇa arthinā
nirnimeṣa īkṣaṇaḥ maunī tam vīkṣya kṣapita āśayaḥ
netra pāṇa indriyaiḥ kṣipram tam eva sahasā aviśat
deham nirmoka vat tyaktvā praviṣṭe vidure nṛpaḥ

original: vihāya rājasaṃ bhāvaṃ babhūva jñānanirbharaḥ // Bhmj_15.48 //
analyzed: vihāya rājasam bhāvam babhūva jñāna nirbharaḥ
dagdhum abhyudyatam kṣattuḥ atha tatra kalevaram
yudhiṣṭhiram vyoma carāḥ jñāna siddhāḥ nyavārayan
tatas sametya tat sarvam dhṛtarāṣṭrāya bhūpatiḥ

original: nivedya tasthau nirduḥkhaḥ sānujo māturantike // Bhmj_15.50 //
analyzed: nivedya tasthau nirduḥkhaḥ sa anujaḥ mātuḥ antike
phala āhāraḥ kṣamā śāyī kṣapayitvā atha śarvarīm
prātar datvā yathākāmam dvijebhyaḥ ratna kāñcanam
rāja ṛṣibhiḥ saha āsīnam praṇamya kuru puṃgavam

original: dadarśa tejasāṃ rāśiṃ prāptaṃ satyavatīsutam // Bhmj_15.52 //
analyzed: dadarśa tejasām rāśim prāptam satyavatī sutam
vyāsaḥ api dharmatanayam saṃbhāvya racita añjalim

original: yatidharmeṇa tāṃ siddhiṃ ślāghyāṃ kṣatturapūjayat // Bhmj_15.53 //
analyzed: yati dharmeṇa tām siddhim ślāghyām kṣattuḥ apūjayat
arthitaḥ kṣatra vṛddhena gāndhāryā pṛthayā tayā
para loka gatān sarvān bhūpālān saha kauravaiḥ
adarśayat kuru strīṇām vyāsaḥ svarga nadī jale
sādhvyaḥ api tān anuyayuḥ vimānaiḥ tyakta vigrahāḥ
atha dharmātmajaḥ rājā tatra saptarṣi sevite

original: māsaṃ sthitvā puraṃ prāyātkuruvṛddhena coditaḥ // Bhmj_15.56 //
analyzed: māsam sthitvā puram prāyāt kuruvṛddhena coditaḥ
ratha aśva kuñjara anīkaiḥ sa gatvā niḥśvasan muhur

original: akāma iva kṛcchreṇa rājadhānīṃ samāviśat // Bhmj_15.57 //
analyzed: akāmaḥ iva kṛcchreṇa rājadhānīm samāviśat
atha dharmeṇa vasudhām dharmarājasya śāsataḥ
yāti kāle sura muniḥ nāradaḥ samupāyayau
dhṛtarāṣṭra kathām pṛṣṭaḥ pūjitaḥ sa mahībhujā

original: uvāca rājanyāto 'sau rājarṣiḥ paramāṃ gatim // Bhmj_15.59 //
analyzed: uvāca rājan yātaḥ asau rājarṣiḥ paramām gatim
saṃvatsaram vāyubhakṣaḥ varṣam ca tyakta bhojanaḥ
kanduka ākāra vadanaḥ durlakṣyaḥ saḥ abhavat kṛśaḥ
tatas sa vahnīn tatyāja mumukṣuḥ niṣkriyaḥ muniḥ
kānane te api avartanta jarat taru nirantare

original: tatra priyāsakho rājā kuntyā saha mahāmatiḥ /
analyzed: tatra priyā sakhaḥ rājā kuntyā saha mahāmatiḥ

original: vanaṃ prajvalitaṃ dṛṣṭvā samādhi vidadhe param // Bhmj_15.62 //
analyzed: vanam prajvalitam dṛṣṭvā samādhi vidadhe param
a vyāptāḥ vyāpakāḥ su acchāḥ svayam galita vṛttayaḥ
sphuca brahmāṇḍa vivarāḥ te dhāma paramam yayuḥ
evam śama aṅkuraḥ teṣām sarva saṃnyāsa pallavaḥ

original: tato dāvāgninā tena dagdhāste bandhunā yathā /
analyzed: tatas dāva agninā tena dagdhāḥ te bandhunā yathā
saṃjayaḥ tu vrata kṣāmaḥ yātaḥ tuhina bhūdharam
śrutvā etat pāṇḍu tanayaḥ vyāptaḥ śoka kṛṣāṇu śānunā

original: śuśoca sānujaḥ kuntīṃ sasutaṃ ca kurūdvaham // Bhmj_15.66 //
analyzed: śuśoca sa anujaḥ kuntīm sa sutam ca kuru udvaham

original: tataḥ prayāte devarṣau rājā kṛtvā jalakriyām /
analyzed: tatas prayāte devarṣau rājā kṛtvā jalakriyām
tān evā uddiśya vipulam dadau draviṇam akṣayam
saḥ atha dhairyam samālambya śokam utsārya deha jam
saṃsāra asāra tām dhyāyan viveka śaraṇaḥ abhavat

original: bhāvāḥ svabhāvaviśarārava eva teṣu saktaṃ mano na virahe sahate 'nutāpam /
analyzed: bhāvāḥ svabhāva viśarāravaḥ eva teṣu saktam manaḥ na virahe sahate anutāpam

original: tatsarvathā priyaviyogaviṣāhatānāṃ śāntyai sudhā tanubhṛtāṃ vipulo vivekaḥ // Bhmj_15.69 //
analyzed: tat sarvathā priya viyoga viṣa āhatānām śāntyai sudhā tanubhṛtām vipulaḥ vivekaḥ
iti śrī kṣemendra viracitāyām bhāratamañjaryām āśramavāsikam parva
